actions.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment (A011) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A011) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole

description: Amendment requires a report to Congress on the best means for aligning federally funded cybersecurity research and development with private sector efforts to protect privacy and civil liberties while assuring security and resilience of the Nation's critical infrastructure.
purpose: An amendment numbered 11 printed in Part B of House Report 114-88 to require a report to Congress on the best means for aligning federally funded cybersecurity research and development with private sector efforts to protect privacy and civil liberties while assuring security and resilience of the Nation's critical infrastructure.
